price: 难道他们因同族的警告者来临他们而惊讶吗？不归信的人们说：“这是奇事！
arabic: بَلۡ عَجِبُوٓاْ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٞ مِّنۡهُمۡ فَقَالَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ هَٰذَا شَيۡءٌ عَجِيبٌ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: bal ʿajibū an jāahum mundhirun min'hum faqāla al-kāfirūna hādhā shayon ʿajībun
